translations: 特种部队；（从事某工作或活动的）一群人；（美国）海军陆战队；（由两个或两个以上师组成的）军，兵团

sentences.sentence: She served in the medical corps.
The Marine Corps was the last service to integrate.
sentences.translation: 美国海军陆战队是最后合并的部队。

sentences.sentence: David McNeil is travelling with the White House press corps.
sentences.translation: 大卫•麦克尼尔正与白宫记者团同行。
